import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

const layoutProps = {
  
};
export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"near-documentation"}}>{`NEAR Documentation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`NEAR Protocol is a scalable, developer-friendly platform for creating decentralized applications.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`This documentation should provide you with everything you need to get started with NEAR as well as a reference to support ongoing development.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"navigation"}}>{`Navigation`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"quick-start"}}>{`Quick start`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Quick Start section provides you with everything you need to:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ol" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Quickly get an application running on NEAR`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Become familiar with the `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="li" props={{"href":"https://studio.nearprotocol.com/debugger/"}}>{`Block Explorer and debugger`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Build and run a node from source`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ol">{`Run and interact with DevNet`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"basics"}}>{`Basics`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Basics section will get you quickly up to speed on the basic concepts and functions you need to write and interact with contracts.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"tutorials"}}>{`Tutorials`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Tutorials section contains several tutorials which will help you learn how to build, test and deploy smart contracts.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"protocol-details"}}>{`Protocol Details`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Protocol Details section contains in-depth information about the protocol itself.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"client-api"}}>{`Client API`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`The Client API section contains `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"/lib/js"}}>{`documentation for the NEARLib.js`}</MDXTag>{` library.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"support--community"}}>{`Support & Community`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`If you have any questions about NEAR, you can get direct access to the team behind it and other members of the community through `}<MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="p" props={{"href":"http://near.chat"}}>{`Discord`}</MDXTag>{`.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
